cps.server.controllers

Class LotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cps.server.controllers.RequestController
      • cps.server.controllers.LotController

  • public class LotController
extends RequestController
    Handles Parking Lot requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LotController(ServerController serverController)
      Instantiates a new lot controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InitLotResponse handle(InitLotAction request, ServiceSession session)
      Create and initialize a new Parking Lot.
      ServerResponse handle(ListParkingLotsRequest request, UserSession session)
      Retrieve a list of all Parking Lots in the system.
      ServerResponse handle(ParkingCellSetDisabledAction action, ServiceSession session)
      Disable a Parking Cell inside of the lot - cars cannot be parked here.
      ServerResponse handle(ParkingCellSetReservedAction action, ServiceSession session)
      Reserve a Parking Cell inside of the Lot for future use - cars cannot park here via the normal process.
      RequestLotStateResponse handle(RequestLotStateAction action, ServiceSession session)
      Return all the information about the specified Parking Lot, including the content of the Parking Cells inside of the lot.
      SetFullLotResponse handle(SetFullLotAction action, ServiceSession session)
      Set the alternative lots for redirecting users if the lot is full, and optionally set a `lot is full` flag.
      UpdatePricesResponse handle(UpdatePricesAction action, ServiceSession session)
      Update the local service prices for the specified Parking Lot.

        error, errorIf, errorIfNull, getDatabaseController, getServerController

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
